title: DevFest Berlin 2016 in pictures
brief: Check out the shared [photo album](https://goo.gl/photos/Er2jaUoJ5hSi7zDd9) of last year's DevFest Berlin.

title: Call for Participation
brief: GDG DevFest Berlin 2017 has been announced! It will take place on **November 3-5**. That means it's time to open the *Call for Participation*. Submission deadline is 2017-10-20.

title: Tickets on sale
brief: We are happy to announce that our ticket sale is now open! If you want to be part of our exciting event.

title: Last minute information
brief: To make sure you will have a great time, here are some last minute things you should know before the event.
